messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Fred. May I ask who I am speaking with today?
This is Paula. And I'm really frustrated right now!
I'm sorry to hear that, Paula. How can I assist you today?
I received a bill for my Nespresso Coffee Capsules, and it's way higher than it should be! What is going on?

I apologize for any inconvenience, Paula. Let me pull up your account information and take a look at the billing details for you. Could you please provide your account number or the email associated with your Nespresso account?
My account number is 123456. You better fix this quickly.
Thank you, Paula. I’m retrieving your account details now. Please bear with me for a moment.
Paula, I see that there was an additional charge for an expedited shipping option. Could that be the reason for the higher bill?
No, I never selected expedited shipping! This is ridiculous. You guys are just trying to rip me off.
I apologize for the misunderstanding, Paula. Let me investigate this further and see what we can do to rectify the situation.

Paula, it appears there was a system error that automatically added the expedited shipping charge to your bill. I have removed the charge, and you should see the corrected amount on your next billing statement.
This is unacceptable. How often does this happen? Can I trust you guys with my billing information?
I understand your frustration, Paula, and I assure you that this is a rare occurrence. We are taking steps to prevent such errors in the future. Your trust is very important to us.
It better not happen again. Thanks for fixing it, but I'm still not happy about this.
I understand, Paula. If there's anything else I can assist you with today, please let me know.
